page.title: 17Football Hooliganism.
page.content: Many people think that the hooliganism at Brussels was very sad because the hooligans killed and injured so many innocent spectators. Most people think that it is not fair that English clubs are banned from playing in other countries because it was not the Liverpool fans fault entirely. A lot of people say that they hope that they have set a good example to their children by not being hooligans themselves. Many think that hooligans should be punished by being put in prison or fined heavily.Some parents are worried about watching matches because of the hooligans.
